==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=毬}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|玉|求|alt1=⺩|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

===Etymology===
"Ball", earlier some "kind of jade". Bodman (1980) relates this to Wuming {{cog|za||klau<sup>A2</sup>|ball}}, and relates {{zh-l|俅|gem-adorned}} to {{cog|bo|གྲུ||lustre of gems}}. This character had a softened initial in {{etyl|zhx-min-pro|-}}.

}}
